title: Which female K-pop idols have a hot and fierce type of beauty? - Quora

response.answer_text: • Hyuna  she came to my mind instantly. in my opinion she is one of the most fierce female idols, if not THE most fierce. she has such a confident sexy vibe about her.• CLC Yeeun  her eyes completely change once she is on stage. her gaze gets sharper, and it’s hard to look away from her when she is performing. she looks kinda intimidating in this picture.• CL  CL is a given for fierce female idols. her stage presence, in my opinion, is unmatched even today. her aura on stage was on an entirely different level, and she was professional at hyping up the crowd.• G-idle Soyeon  she stands out the most in g-idle because her stage presence is the best out of the members. she is very charming and on stage her rapping is good. she also appears very confident with her skills when she’s on stage.• Mamamoo Hwasa  she is another given. her sexiness comes naturally, especially with her very attractive healthy body. her face is very unique and appealing to me, and she is very confident with herself despite not fitting k beauty standards. she also has great stage presence
